definition: to have/there is/there are/to exist/to be
full moon/to hope/to expect/to visit/to gaze (into the distance)/to look towards/towards
15th day of month (lunar calendar)/old variant of 望[wang4]

sentences.english: The company expects to produce 4.5 million ounces this year.
sentences.chinese: 安格鲁黄金公司今年有望生产450万盎司黄金。

sentences.english: At present, these problems are expected to be solved by using whole-cell catalyst technology.
sentences.chinese: 目前，采用全细胞催化等技术工艺有望解决这些难题。

sentences.english: There was hope that the war could end by Christmas, December twenty-fifth.
sentences.chinese: 战争有望在十二月25号，即圣诞节之前结束。

sentences.english: TLR4 is expected to become a new target for cancer biotherapy.
sentences.chinese: TLR4有望成为肿瘤生物治疗的新靶点。

sentences.english: Therefore, this kind of MWNT/PVDF nanocomposites has potential and broad applications, for example, electroactive materials.
sentences.chinese: 这种复合材料有望在电活性材料领域得到应用。

sentences.english: The attack was in a part of the country where it had been hoped signs of normal life were returning.
sentences.chinese: 攻击是在一个有望恢复正常生活的县份发生的。

sentences.english: I have found them hardy, and hopefully they will reappear this summer.
sentences.chinese: 我发现它们抗逆性强，今年夏天也有望再现。

sentences.english: Within the next three years it hopes to serve the pet jet-set in 25 North American cities.
sentences.chinese: 在未来三年里，北美25个城市有望开通宠物航班。

sentences.english: It means farmers will have the same say in the country's decision-making process as urbanites.
sentences.chinese: 中国城乡居民将有望实现在立法机构中“同票同权”。

sentences.english: The financial rewards of successful bio-prospecting are likely to be significant.
sentences.chinese: 成功的生物开发有望得到丰厚的经济回报。

sentences.english: The financial rewards of successful bio-prospecting are likely lo be significant.
sentences.chinese: 成功的生物开发有望得到丰厚的经济回报。

sentences.english: T2K hopes to start taking data again in 2012.
sentences.chinese: T2K实验有望于2012年再次开始记录数据。

sentences.english: Our army is attacking the enemy, and hopefully will defeat them by late afternoon.
sentences.chinese: 军发起进击，有望在傍晚将其击退。

sentences.english: We can hope the damage is reparable.
sentences.chinese: 但这点损伤，我们还是可以有望弥补的。

sentences.english: Nevertheless, O’Sullivan is a favourite to win this year’s championship.
sentences.chinese: 尽管如此，奥沙利文却有望能获得今年的冠军。

sentences.english: The finished report is expected to be published in early autumn.
sentences.chinese: 最终的报告有望于今年初秋发布。

definition: auxiliary verb introducing future action: may (be able to)/will (cause)/should (enable)/going to
when the time comes/at the scheduled time
whether or not/can it or can't it/is it possible?
to work hard for/to do all one can/to contend strongly
outlook/prospect/to look ahead/to look forward to
to have a promising future/to have bright prospects
